item.title: 'Embarrassing' symptoms of one the UK's deadliest cancers could strike on toilet
item.description: The NHS has urged people to speak to their GP they spot any of these signs, as this disease remains the second most deadly form of cancer in the UK.

item.title: NHS issues plea to get screened for this deadly cancer that can be overlooked
item.description: Symptoms of this disease could often be dismissed for something else, but getting screened can ensure any cancerous cells are picked up early.

item.title: Met Office says mercury to rocket by a huge 17C in December amid mild spell
item.description: Sunday marks the start of the meteorological winter - but forecasters say it won't feel like the cold season at all, as temperatures are going to clim...

item.title: Combine these two 'superfoods' from the kitchen to boost immunity and gut health
item.description: These popular ingredients can be used in cooking or alternatively made into a tea or taken as a supplement.

item.title: Michael Mosley warned four foods 'do more harm than good'
item.description: The TV doctor and diet guru warned against some seemingly healthy foods
